mapper.select: SELECT c.crewNo, c.geoCode, c.categoryBigNo, c.categorySmallNo, c.crewName, c.crewIntro, c.crewContent, c.crewMax, c.crewAttend, c.crewStatus, c.crewOriginalImg, c.crewSaveImg, c.crewOriginalBanner, c.crewSaveBanner, c.crewDeadDate, c.createdAt, c.updatedAt, g.geoCity, g.geoDistrict, cb.categoryBigName, cs.categorySmallName FROM crew c LEFT JOIN geo g ON c.geoCode = g.geoCode LEFT JOIN category_big cb ON c.categoryBigNo = cb.categoryBigNo LEFT JOIN category_small cs ON c.categorySmallNo = cs.categorySmallNo ORDER BY c.createdAt DESC LIMIT #{recordPerPage} OFFSET #{startNo};

SELECT c.crewNo, c.geoCode, c.categoryBigNo, c.categorySmallNo, c.crewName, c.crewIntro, c.crewContent, c.crewMax, c.crewAttend, c.crewStatus, c.crewOriginalImg, c.crewSaveImg, c.crewOriginalBanner, c.crewSaveBanner, c.crewDeadDate, c.createdAt, c.updatedAt, g.geoCity, g.geoDistrict, cb.categoryBigName, cs.categorySmallName FROM crew c LEFT JOIN geo g ON c.geoCode = g.geoCode LEFT JOIN category_big cb ON c.categoryBigNo = cb.categoryBigNo LEFT JOIN category_small cs ON c.categorySmallNo = cs.categorySmallNo WHERE c.categoryBigNo = #{ctg} ORDER BY c.createdAt DESC LIMIT #{recordPerPage} OFFSET #{startNo};

SELECT c.crewNo, c.geoCode, c.categoryBigNo, c.categorySmallNo, c.crewName, c.crewIntro, c.crewContent, c.crewMax, c.crewAttend, c.crewStatus, c.crewOriginalImg, c.crewSaveImg, c.crewOriginalBanner, c.crewSaveBanner, c.crewDeadDate, c.createdAt, c.updatedAt, g.geoCity, g.geoDistrict, cb.categoryBigName, cs.categorySmallName FROM crew c LEFT JOIN geo g ON c.geoCode = g.geoCode LEFT JOIN category_big cb ON c.categoryBigNo = cb.categoryBigNo LEFT JOIN category_small cs ON c.categorySmallNo = cs.categorySmallNo WHERE c.crewNo = #{crewNo}

SELECT cm.crewMemberNo, cm.crewNo, m.memberNo, cm.crewMemberStatus, cm.createdAt, m.memberNickname, m.memberSaveImg FROM crew_member cm LEFT JOIN member m ON cm.memberNo = m.memberNo WHERE crewNo = #{crewNo} ORDER BY cm.crewMemberStatus DESC
SELECT categoryBigNo, categoryBigName, categoryBigIcon, createdAt FROM category_big
SELECT categorySmallNo, categoryBigNo, categorySmallName, createdAt FROM category_small
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO crew (geoCode, categoryBigNo, categorySmallNo, memberNo, crewName, crewContent, crewIntro, crewMax, crewOriginalImg, crewSaveImg, crewOriginalBanner, crewSaveBanner) VALUES(#{geoCode}, #{categoryBigNo}, #{categorySmallNo}, #{memberNo}, #{crewName}, #{crewContent}, #{crewIntro}, #{crewMax}, #{crewOriginalImg}, #{crewSaveImg}, #{crewOriginalBanner}, #{crewSaveBanner})
INSERT INTO crew_member (crewNo, memberNo , crewMemberStatus) VALUES(#{crewNo}, #{memberNo} , #{crewMemberStatus})
mapper.update: UPDATE crew_member SET crewMemberStatus = 2 WHERE crewNo = #{crewNo} AND crewMemberStatus = 3
mapper.delete: DELETE FROM crew_member WHERE crewNo = #{crewNo} AND memberNo = #{memberNo}
DELETE FROM crew_like WHERE crewNo = #{crewNo} AND memberNo = #{memberNo}
